import React from 'react'; import { Link as RouterLink } from 'react-router-dom'; // material-ui import { makeStyles, useTheme } from '@material-ui/styles'; import { Button, CardMedia, Chip, Divider, Grid, Link, Stack, Table, TableBody, TableCell, TableContainer, TableHead, TableRow, Typography } from '@material-ui/core'; // project imports import BillCard from 'ui-component/cards/BillCard'; import SubCard from 'ui-component/cards/SubCard'; import AnimateButton from 'ui-component/extended/AnimateButton'; import { gridSpacing } from 'store/constant'; // assets import imageDiscover from 'assets/images/pages/card-discover.png'; import imageMasterCard from 'assets/images/pages/card-master.png'; import imageVisa from 'assets/images/pages/card-visa.png'; // style constant const useStyles = makeStyles({ opacity50: { opacity: '.5' }, projectTableCard: { padding: '0px', paddingBottom: '0px !important', overflowX: 'auto' }, paymentEndContent: { minWidth: 'auto' } }); // table data function createData(tid, date, amount, badgeText, badgeType) { return { tid, date, amount, badgeText, badgeType }; } const rows = [ createData('12877227695', '26 Feb 2021 9:16 am', '$56.32', 'Awaiting', 'secondary'), createData('12901477937', '30 Jan 2021 2:54 pm', '$75.56', 'Paid', 'primary'), createData('12767886919', '22 Jan 2021 12:01 pm', '$34.23', 'Paid', 'primary') ]; // ===========================|| PROFILE 3 - BILLING ||=========================== // const Billing = () => { const classes = useStyles(); const theme = useTheme(); return ( } >
Visa card Ending in 5269 07XX XXXX 8110
| Edit
Discover Ending in 6109 07XX XXXX 8020
Make Default | Edit
Mastercard Ending in 7278 07XX XXXX 4290
Make Default | Edit Order No. Date Price Status {rows.map((row, index) => ( {row.tid} {row.date} {row.amount} ))}
); }; export default Billing;
